COMMENTS: This is config file for the current potion command
CURRENT_POTION_COMMAND is a list of the prefix that is used for command
If viewer type only prefix, it will say list of the potion by
format as CURRENT_POTIONS_ONE_MESSAGE_DEFAULT of each potion
separate by CURRENT_POTIONS_SEPARATOR_MESSAGE_DEFAULT
and finally say as format CURRENT_POTIONS_MESSAGE_DEFAULT
If viewer type the slot number (leftmost is 1)
say as format CURRENT_POTION_MESSAGE_DEFAULT
<T_VIEWER> is the ID of Twitch viewer typed command
<CP_NUMBER> is the slot of the potion(starts from 1)
<CP_NAME> is the name of potion
<CP_DESC> is the description of potion
<CP_LIST> is the list of parsed potion
CURRENT_POTION_ENABLED determine whether use this command. true/false
CURRENT_POTION_ALL_ENABLED determine whether use say all command(without number). true/false
CURRENT_POTION_ONE_ENABLED determine whether use say one command(with number). true/false
TIMEOUT_GLOBAL is the global cooldown(ms, 1000ms=1second) for this command
TIMEOUT_ALL is the cooldown(ms, 1000ms=1second) for say all command
TIMEOUT_ONE is the cooldown(ms, 1000ms=1second) for say one command, applied for each slot
MAX_LEN is the max length of the description of one potion (2147483647 = infinite)
If the description of one potion is longer than MAX_LEN, it trims with following ...
example of the default, !cp -> '@gyeryak Strength Potion(1), Speed Potion(4), Flex Potion(5)
example of the default, !cp 1 -> '@gyeryak (1) Strength Potion: Gain 2 Strength
Be careful of the JSON and Regex
